title: Import CSV files from Filesystem into Postgres
author: rpshu

readme:
\-- Disclaimer: This template is mainly made for self-hosted users who can reach CSV files in their file system. For Cloud users, just replace the first few nodes with your file system of choice, like Google Drive or Dropbox --

## How to automatically import CSV files into postgres

### 1、project description

This workflow demonstrates how CSV file can be automatically imported into existing PostgreSQL database.  
![Import CSV into PostgreSQL.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Import_CSV_into_Postgre_SQL_ed76792bcd.png)

Before running the workflow please make sure you have a file on the server:
    
    
    /tmp/t1.csv
    

The name of the test database is db01, and you can replace it.

then create table t1
    
    
    create table t1(id int,name varchar(10));
    

And the content of the file is the following:  
|id|name|  
|-|-|-|  
|1|a|  
|2|b|  
|3|c|

### 2、Other

If you want to import a custom csv file, please refer to the following methods.

#### 2.1、Create a table in the database

SQL Commands:  
<https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-createtable.html>

#### 2.2、Upload csv file

Upload csv file to N8N server and make sure it can be read.
readme_html:
-- Disclaimer: This template is mainly made for self-hosted users who can reach CSV files in their file system. For Cloud users, just replace the first few nodes with your file system of choice, like Google Drive or Dropbox --

How to automatically import CSV files into postgres

1、project description

This workflow demonstrates how CSV file can be automatically imported into existing PostgreSQL database.

Before running the workflow please make sure you have a file on the server:

/tmp/t1.csv

The name of the test database is db01, and you can replace it.

then create table t1

create table t1(id int,name varchar(10));

And the content of the file is the following:
|id|name|
|-|-|-|
|1|a|
|2|b|
|3|c|

2、Other

If you want to import a custom csv file, please refer to the following methods.

2.1、Create a table in the database

SQL Commands:
https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-createtable.html

2.2、Upload csv file

Upload csv file to N8N server and make sure it can be read.
readme_zh:
\-- 免责声明：此模板主要面向能够访问文件系统中CSV文件的自托管用户。云服务用户只需将前几个节点替换为所选的文件系统（如Google Drive或Dropbox）即可 --

## 如何将CSV文件自动导入PostgreSQL

### 1、项目说明

本工作流演示如何将CSV文件自动导入现有的PostgreSQL数据库。  
![导入CSV到PostgreSQL.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Import_CSV_into_Postgre_SQL_ed76792bcd.png)

运行工作流前，请确保服务器上存在以下文件：
    
    
    /tmp/t1.csv
    

测试数据库名称为db01，您可自行替换。

然后创建表t1：
    
    
    create table t1(id int,name varchar(10));
    

文件内容如下：  
|id|name|  
|-|-|-|  
|1|a|  
|2|b|  
|3|c|

### 2、其他说明

如需导入自定义CSV文件，请参考以下方法。

#### 2.1、在数据库中创建表

SQL命令参考：  
<https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-createtable.html>

#### 2.2、上传CSV文件

将CSV文件上传至N8N服务器并确保可读取权限。
